sentence.Network_en: Scandinavian punch made of claret and aquavit with spices and raisins and orange peel and sugar.
sentence.Network_cn: 用红葡萄、白兰地烈性酒、葡萄干及橘子皮和糖混合而成的斯堪的纳维亚人的一种鸡尾酒.

sentence.Network_en: I gave him a cup of tea while the rest exultingly drinking aquavit.
sentence.Network_cn: 当别人继续兴高采烈地喝着白兰地的时候,我随手为那位朋友端去了一杯热茶.
